comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic appeared in the Sydney Mail's coverage of an interstate ploughing carnival held at Coolamon in 1907...the pic appears on pp. 486-487 (p. 18 of this issue will get you there)...I can't find a link to the article...but this gets you to the front page - news.google.com/newspapers?id=-jhVAAAAIBAJ&sjid=DZUDA... The Sydney Mail caption identifies the subject etc. also see - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2414459387/
